snippet.title: The Sacred Acorn - Teaser
snippet.description:
The Sacred Acorn is a deceptively cute top-down 2D action adventure game for PC with stunning hand drawn art and a gorgeous soundtrack, currently in development by A Few Dragons. Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259760/The_Sacred_Acorn/
___________________________________________________________________________________________________

~ STAY UPDATED ~
